headline: Introducing WARP for Desktop and Cloudflare for Teams
keywords: Product News, Zero Trust, Zero Trust Week, 1.1.1.1, WARP, Cloudflare Gateway, Cloudflare Access, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Security
description: Starting today Cloudflare WARP is available on Windows, macOS, iOS and Android. Warp clients can be enrolled in Cloudflare for Teams organizations to extend security protection to remote workers.
